alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 13 at 2:51AM CDT until September 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Pecatonica River at Freeport affecting Stephenson County. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Pecatonica River at Freeport. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water affects low lying sections of Freeport mainly east of the Pecatonica River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this morning.
